articles.title: Optimizing website performance with a Search Console bubble chart
articles.description:
In this post, we’ll discuss a bubble chart that can help you understand which queries are performing well for your site,
 and which could be improved. We’ll first explain the main elements in the chart, describing specific settings and how they
 influence the…
articles.content:
Wednesday, April 06, 2022
Analyzing Search performance data is always a challenge, but even more so when you have plenty of long-tail queries,
